about_the_game:
INTO THE BACKROOMS - Psychological horror in which you will experience the true experience of fear.
If you’re not careful and you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas you’ll end up in the Backrooms, where it’s nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz, and approximately six hundred million square miles of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in. God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you.
> true experience of fear.
detailed_description:
INTO THE BACKROOMS - Psychological horror in which you will experience the true experience of fear.
If you’re not careful and you noclip out of reality in the wrong areas you’ll end up in the Backrooms, where it’s nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz, and approximately six hundred million square miles of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in. God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you.
> true experience of fear.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12 +, Steam OS
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060| AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 / Xbox One Controller / DualShock 4 / Nintendo Switch Pro Controller and other SDL compatible controllers
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14, Steam OS
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060| AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard
  • Additional Notes: Supports Xbox 360 / Xbox One Controller / DualShock 4 / Nintendo Switch Pro Controller and other SDL compatible controllers

name: INTO THE BACKROOMS

  • DirectX: Version 11

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060| AMD Radeon RX 580
